title: Ancient pot-like vessel found in Rajasthan's Tonk, treasure suspected
description: An ancient pot-like vessel, suspected to contain treasure, was discovered in Rajasthan's Tonk district. Police have secured the object, and the Archaeology Department will investigate its contents amid suspicions of occult rituals at the site.

title: India News | Rajasthan: Ancient Pot Discovered; Archaelogy Department to Investigate Treasure Claims
description: Get latest articles and stories on India at LatestLY. "We have now written to the Director of the Archaeology Department regarding this, requesting that they send a team to examine it and take further action for its proper disposition... The team from the Archaeology Department will arrive, and then it will be opened. Only then will we know what is inside," ADM said.
